params.eigenDAServiceManager: the contract in which the batch was confirmed
params.quorumNumber: the quorum number to get the adversary threshold percentage for

params.blobHeader: the header of the blob containing relevant attributes of the blob
params.blobVerificationProof: the relevant data needed to prove inclusion of the blob and that the trust assumptions were as expected
params.eigenDAServiceManager: the contract in which the batch was confirmed
